rooms.name: Ollivanders
rooms.description: Ollivanders is a wand shop founded in 382 B.C.. Located in Diagon Alley South Side in London, England, it is owned by the Ollivander family, widely acknowledged to be the best wandmakers in Great Britain.

rooms.name: Great Hall
rooms.description:
The Great Hall is the main place where students receive their meals and daily owl post.
 They also have certain special events, such as the Sorting Ceremony and the Hallowe'en Feast. The large hall has enough space to hold every student, as well as the main staff and guests. 
 The Hall has tall walls that reach up to the ceiling, which is covered with floating candles and enchanted to look like the sky above. 
 At the front of the hall is the staff table, also known as the High Table, which is designed to house the entire Hogwarts staff. In the centre of the table is a throne chair where the present Headteacher sits. At the left of the table is a door which leads a chamber with portraits.

rooms.name: Forbidden_Forest
rooms.description:
The Forbidden Forest, also known as the Dark Forest, borders the edges of the Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry grounds. 
 The forest is a very old place that holds many secrets and houses many creatures, some dark and Dangerous, others friendly. 
 The trees in the forest are considered ancient, they are dense and rough looking from years of exposure to the elements.As the forest's name suggests, it is strictly off limits to students — except in the case of detention, or Care of Magical Creatures lessons that occasionally take place there. 
 Of course, with the various dangerous creatures living in the Forest, few students would even want to venture into it. Black flowers are known to grow in the forest.

rooms.name: Classroom
rooms.description: A place for learning: Here, you can practice spells and add them to your repertoire.

rooms.name: Siebel1112
rooms.description: You are in Siebel 1112.  There is space for two code reviews in this room.

rooms.name: SiebelEastHallway
rooms.description: You are in the east hallway.  You can see Einstein Bros' Bagels and a stairway.

rooms.name: Siebel1314
rooms.description: You are in Siebel 1314.  There are happy CS 126 students doing a code review.

rooms.name: SiebelBasement
rooms.description: You are in the basement of Siebel.  You see tables with students working and door to computer labs.

monsters.name: Guardian-of-Admissions
monsters.description: This monster guards against wannabe CS freshmen and transfers.

monsters.name: ACM-Mafia
monsters.description: Never borrow money from ACM. ACM is gonna get ya.

monsters.name: Ghosts-of-Student-GPAs
monsters.description: Once students at CS@Illinois, their GPAs were broken beyond repair. As revenge, they'll break the GPA of all who venture near.

monsters.name: Coffee-Zombies
monsters.description: Einstein Bros' Coffee actually contained a virus, turning all students who frequent it into mindless, soulless, coffee-driven zombies... or maybe it was just the 8am.

monsters.name: CS125-Student-Swarm
monsters.description: As the word 'help' echoes in your head, these students will rip you apart, asking for 125 MP help.

monsters.name: 126-Students
monsters.description: Angry at you for interrupting their code review, these students serve as the primary defense of the moderator.

monsters.name: Code-Review-Moderator
monsters.description: The final boss. Vanquish the moderator and your GPA is safe.
